definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The Northern Song to Jin, who are said Lishi County is the state stone.
sentences.chinese: 北宋至金，县名俱称离石，属石州。

sentences.english: Since then, the relationship between the number of administrative changes, but the counties were still in use.
sentences.chinese: 此后，行政隶属关系多有改变，但县名沿用至今。

sentences.english: The origin of the name of Linchuan, there are several legend.
sentences.chinese: 关于“灵川”县名的由来，有多种说法。

definition: seat of the principal county magistrate in imperial China
seat of prefectural government (from Tang to Qing times)
general history of a county/county annals
reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
official name of a nation (includes dynastic names of China: 漢|汉[Han4], 唐[Tang2] etc)
name of job in Imperial bureaucracy/official position
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
Gu county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
